data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Nidwalden, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nidwalden, Switzerland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Nidwalden, Switzerland and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Nidwalden, Switzerland.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Nidwalden, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 40,800 people living in Nidwalden, Switzerland. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Nidwalden.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Nidwalden, Switzerland has a population of 40,800.

We estimate Nidwalden has 1,636 people who might know Jesus, 29,428 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,736 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Nidwalden, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
